item.description:
August 1, from 4 â€“ 7pm at the Strand Theatre in Dorchester.
This event is FREE. However, attendees must obtain tickets before the show. Tickets are available at the Strand Theatre Box-Office (543 Columbia Road), from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m., from Tuesday, July 28 through Friday, July 31, 2009. Tickets are available on a first come first served basis and are limited to 2 tickets per-person. For complete details visit www.strandboston.com
i will try to pick up as many tix as i can. i live right down the street.

Here is our video from last year Mark M. made at the Hip Hop Concert.
Hip Hop 911Truth Action:
http://www.youtube.co...

This year lets do an even better job with giving people info handing out 9/11 truth music and DVD's to the crowd. We need your help to show up and help with any ideas.

August 1st
PEACE HIP HOP
With the best of old school
hip hop.
Time and Location: TBD by city of Boston. Check here for more details ...
or here:
www.cityofboston.gov/arts

I also noticed that on this web page the city is accepting applications for artists/ people to colorfully/ artistically design electrical box's in order to deter graffiti and beautify the neighborhood the box is in. Any artist willing to submit some designs with a 9/11 truth theme... or anything? Check it out.

-Mark O'C.
WeAreChangeBoston.org
WeAreChangeBoston@gmail.com
youtube.com/WeareChangeBoston

group.name: We Are Change Boston / Boston 9/11 Truth

item.name: 9/11 Truth @ Boston Peace Hip Hop Concert
